title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: TWR-NOMA-Based IoT Network Performance Analysis for Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure of the TWR-NOMA system and the principles of applying IoT networks.
Learners can analyze the impact of power allocation (PA) and time-sharing (TS) parameters on system performance.
Learners can quantitatively assess the effects of channel interference and fading on communication quality through mathematical modeling.
Learners can simulate real-time network configurations by applying deep learning-based optimization techniques.
Learners can continuously monitor and improve learning content using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
